Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Lost Tales of Greece | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Lost Tales of Greece]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'On the coast of Boeotia there was a famed poetry festival. It was here that Kassandra was tasked in aiding a young Orchimedes|poet with wooing his idol, the beautiful Praxilla.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Lost Tales of Greece'

General_Description: '''Praxilla's Admirer''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra spoke to [[Orchimedes]] about wooing his idol, the poet [[Praxilla]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra speaks to Alkibiades and Orchimedes.
*'''Alkibiades:''' ''My, my, is that Kassandra of [[Agiad dynasty|Agiad]]? The Eagle Bearer? Messenger of [[Jupiter|Zeus]]? She who launched a thousand hearts?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Alkibiades, I am known by many names, but that last one sounds to be of your own making.''
*'''Alkibiades: '''''My young friend Orchimedes here could use your legendary ''talents ''to woo the object of his desire.''
*'''Orchimedes: '''''You would have my eternal gratitude.''
(If "Who's your friend, Alkibiades?" is chosen.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'd like to know more about the man asking for my help.''
*'''Orchimedes:''''' I'm Orchimedes, I came to Alkibiades because he boasts of his exploits as a lover and knows Praxilla.''
(If "What do you mean, wooing?" is chosen.)
*'''Kassandra: '''''I'm a ''[[Mercenary|misthios]],'' not some famed lover.''
<tabber>
|-|If Lykaon romanced=
*'''Alkibiades: '''''I heard that Kassandra learned a special healing touch from [[Lykaon]].''
|-|If Roxana romanced=
*'''Alkibiades:''' ''Nonsense! She proved her strength, dexterity, and endurance when she got [[Roxana]] on her back.''
|-|If Xenia romanced=
*'''Alkibiades:''' ''Nonsense! I've heard that our ''misthios'' here is the only one allowed near the [[Piracy|pirate]] queen [[Xenia]]'s booty.''
|-|Other romances=
</tabber>
(Tell me what you're trying to do.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What's the job?''
*'''Orchimedes: '''''Have you ever heard of Praxilla?''
*'''Kassandra: '''''The name sounds familiar. Who is she?''
*'''Orchimedes: '''''Who ''is ''she? A poet blessed by [[Apollo]] himself! She describes the [[Greek mythology|gods]] as if they were her lovers. Her lyre is a legendary weapon, wielded in her hands. I want to meet her, but talking to a goddess such as she... terrifying.''
*'''Alkibiades:''' ''Oh nonsense, usually you give a woman some flowers and she'll show you her flower. However, this is Praxilla. She is not easily impressed.''
*'''Orchimedes:''' ''Of course, no ordinary flower will do. They need to be worthy of a goddess.''
*'''Alkibiades:''' ''I come to this coast every year for the poetry festival. Of all the beautiful blossoms, none match the scent and radiance of the [[Trade Goods|Coral Rose]]. Fetch some, and all doors and ''legs'' shall open for you.''
(Accept – I'll find your Coral Rose.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll return with your flowers.''
(If "Where can I find the Coral Rose?" is chosen.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Where can I find the Coral Rose? It sounds rare.''
*'''Alkibiades:''' ''You would be correct. However, like all good things in life, these take more work than most are willing to expend. They're atop a nearby mountain.''
(If "Where do I meet you after?" is chosen.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Say I do get these flowers... Where would I bring them?''
*'''Orchimedes:''' ''Back to camp. Praxilla should be in her tent.''
(If "What's the poetry festival?" is chosen.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You mentioned being here for a poetry festival?''
*'''Alkibiades:''' ''I did! It's one of the many festivals to Apollo, but this one holds a special place in my heart, among other places. Other festivals are so stuffy. Here, we worship like [[maenad]]s.''
(Leave – I know enough.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I've heard enough.''
*'''Orchimedes:''' ''Please, if you are as skilled with [[sword]] and heart as Alkibiades says, you'll return to me with the Coral Rose. As a poet, it's best that I stay at camp while you do the hiking.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You'd be an easy snack for [[Wolf|wolves]] or [[bear]]s. I'll return with the roses.''
Kassandra left to pick the roses, and soon found them.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''These must be the Coral Roses.''
She then returned to speak with Orchimedes.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I've found your Coral Roses.''
*'''Orchimedes:''' ''You're back! That's... that's perfect. Those roses are perfect. Oh, look at the luster. The fragrance. Now, you must deliver them to her.''
<tabber>
|-|You're the one who came here to see Praxilla.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You came all this way to meet her. You should be the one to do it.''
|-|You didn't pay me to give Praxilla flowers.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's not what I was hired for.'' You ''give them to her.''
</tabber>
*'''Orchimedes:''' ''Please! I'm much too nervous to speak to her. I've composed a poem to recite. Here, let me teach you -'' 
<tabber>
|-|I'm no poet.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'd say it all wrong. I'm a'' misthios, ''not a poet.''
*'''Orchimedes:''' ''Then would you at least deliver the flowers while I rehearse?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Fine, but the rest is up to you.''
|-|Read your own poem.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm not saying any'' malákas ''poem. That's your job, not mine.''
*'''Orchimedes:''' ''Then I must rehearse. Will you at least deliver the flowers before they wilt?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Fine, but you'll do the rest.''
</tabber>
*'''Orchimedes:''' ''OK, she's at her tent. Right there. Go give them to her.''
Kassandra left Orchimedes to talk with Praxilla.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Orchimedes to collect five Coral Roses for Praxilla.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] – [[The Lost Tales of Greece]]''

[[Category:Memories of Kassandra]]
[[Category:Memories relived using the Animus HR-8.5]]
<!--Interwiki links-->
[[fr:L'admirateur de Praxilla]]

Kassandra left to pick the roses, and soon found them.
